trans-unit.source: Provides a string of custom data to the provider for a profile property.
The <xref:System.Web.Profile.CustomProviderDataAttribute> class is used to supply a string of data with a profile property to a custom profile provider.
The custom data string can be set to any string value and is set using the `customProviderData` attribute of the configuration element for adding profile properties.

If the `customProviderData` attribute is set, then the value is placed in the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty.Attributes%2A> collection for the property and is indexed by the name "CustomProviderData."
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.CustomProviderDataAttribute"></xref> class and specifies a string of custom data.
The <xref:System.Web.Profile.CustomProviderDataAttribute> class is used to supply a string of data with a profile property to a custom profile provider.
The custom data string can be set to any string value and is set using the `customProviderData` attribute of the configuration element for adding profile properties.

If the `customProviderData` attribute is set, then the value is placed in the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty.Attributes%2A> collection for the property and is indexed by the name "CustomProviderData."
This constructor is used the .NET Framework and is not intended to be called from application code.
The string of custom data to supply to the provider.
Gets a string of custom data for the profile property provider.

The <xref:System.Web.Profile.CustomProviderDataAttribute.CustomProviderData%2A> property value is set using the `customProviderData` attribute of the configuration element for adding profile properties.
The <xref:System.Web.Profile.CustomProviderDataAttribute.CustomProviderData%2A> property can be set to any string value to be used by the profile provider for the property.

If the `customProviderData` attribute is set, then the value is placed in the <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsProperty.Attributes%2A> collection for the property and is indexed by the name "CustomProviderData."
A string of custom data for the profile property provider.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.CustomProviderDataAttribute.CustomProviderData"></xref> property is set to the default value.
The default value for the <xref:System.Web.Profile.CustomProviderDataAttribute.CustomProviderData%2A> property is `null`, or an empty string for profile properties of type `String`.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Web.Profile.CustomProviderDataAttribute.CustomProviderData"></xref> property is set to the default value; otherwise, `false`.
